column5: Nayuta, now 16, is on his second summer
Even if it is summer vacation,
it's not good for you to stay
I thought it might look even bigger
now than it did last night.
You don't want it to get in the
way of work tomorrow, do you?
(...I don't know what I hope to
There's no way I could go see them.)
Gotta make the most of it!
